article.headline: Chicago St. 70, Texas-Pan American 63
article.story: CHICAGO -- Carl Montgomery had 24 points and 12 rebounds as Chicago State beat Texas-Pan American 70-63. Antonio Lofton added 14 points for the Cougars (5-14, 2-1 Great West), who shot 53 percent from the field and outrebounded the Broncs 33-24. Jamill Harris had 10 points and six assists, while Jonathon Montgomery also had 10 points. Brandon Provost had 18 points and Matt Mierzycki 12 for Texas-Pan American (3-16, 0-2), which lost its 10th straight game despite shooting 46 percent from the field. The Broncs are 0-10 in road games this season. Texas-Pan American led 32-28 at halftime in a game that featured 18 lead changes and six ties.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
